content:
Bread flour is a great choice, and I'm sure it will add a lovely texture to your shortcake. Remember to keep an eye on the dough's development and adjust the recipe as needed. With bread flour, you might need to adjust the liquid content, but also keep an eye on the proofing time, as it can ferment more quickly.

I'm excited to hear about your experiment! Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. And most importantly, have fun and enjoy the process!

Remember, baking is all about experimentation and learning. It's okay to try new things and make mistakes – it's all part of the process. The most important thing is that you're having fun and enjoying the journey.

Good luck, and I hope your sourdough shortcake turns out amazing!
